mapper.select: select g_id, g_name, w_reservTime, w_priceTotal, d_name, d_grade, p_name, w_workTime from workdialog w left join designer d on w.w_d_no = d.d_no left join guest g on w.w_g_no = g.g_no left join event e on w.w_e_name = e.e_name left join level v on g.g_l_grade = v.l_grade left join choice c on w.w_no = c.c_w_no left join product p on c.c_p_name = p.p_name left join tax t on p.p_name = t.t_name where g_id=#{id} and w_worktime is not null is null order by w_reservTime desc

SELECT * FROM workdialog w left join designer d on w.w_d_no=d.d_no left join event e on w.w_e_name=e.e_name left join choice c on w.w_no=c.c_w_no left join product p on c.c_p_name=p.p_name left join guest g on w_g_no=g.g_no where w.w_no=#{wNo}

SELECT * FROM workdialog w left join designer d on w.w_d_no=d.d_no left join event e on w.w_e_name=e.e_name left join choice c on w.w_no=c.c_w_no left join product p on c.c_p_name=p.p_name left join guest g on w_g_no=g.g_no where w.w_d_no=#{wDNo} and w_reservTime > concat(#{date}, ' 00:00:00') and w_reservTime < concat(#{date}, ' 23:59:59') order by w_reservTime
select w_no, w_workTime, w_reservTime, w_e_name, w_d_no, w_g_no, g.g_name from workdialog w join guest g on w.w_d_no=#{dNo} and w.w_g_no=g.g_no;

select w_no, w_workTime, w_reservTime, w_e_name, w_d_no, w_g_no, c_w_no, c_p_name, g_no, g_l_grade, g_email, g_birth, g_name, g_tel, g_point, g_memo from workdialog w left join choice c on w.w_no=c.c_w_no left join guest g on w.w_g_no=g.g_no

SELECT g_name, w_workTime, p_name, p_price, w_priceTotal FROM workdialog w join designer d on w.w_d_no=d.d_no join choice c on w.w_no=c.c_w_no join product p on c.c_p_name=p.p_name join guest g on w_g_no=g.g_no where d_no=#{dNo} and w_workTime is not null

select w_no, w_reservTime, e_name, w_priceTotal, w_workTime, d_name, d_grade, g_name, l_grade, p_name from workdialog w left join designer d on w.w_d_no = d.d_no left join guest g on w.w_g_no = g.g_no left join event e on w.w_e_name = e.e_name left join level v on g.g_l_grade = v.l_grade left join choice c on w.w_no = c.c_w_no left join product p on c.c_p_name = p.p_name left join tax t on p.p_name = t.t_name order by w_no

select w_no, w_reservTime, e_name, w_priceTotal, w_workTime, d_name, d_grade, g_name, l_grade, p_name from workdialog w left join designer d on w.w_d_no = d.d_no left join guest g on w.w_g_no = g.g_no left join event e on w.w_e_name = e.e_name left join level v on g.g_l_grade = v.l_grade left join choice c on w.w_no = c.c_w_no left join product p on c.c_p_name = p.p_name left join tax t on p.p_name = t.t_name where w_reservTime between #{start} and #{end} order by w_no
mapper.update: UPDATE hairshop.workdialog SET w_reservTime=#{wReserveTime}, w_priceTotal=#{wPriceTotal}, w_e_name=#{wEName.eName}, w_d_no=#{wDNo.dNo}, w_g_no=#{wGNo.gNo} WHERE w_no=#{wNo};
UPDATE hairshop.workdialog SET w_workTime=#{wWorkTime}, w_reservTime=#{wReserveTime}, w_priceTotal=#{wPriceTotal}, w_e_name=#{wEName.eName}, w_d_no=#{wDNo.dNo}, w_g_no=#{wGNo.gNo} WHERE w_no=#{wNo};
mapper.select: select count(w_g_no) as w_priceTotal, w_g_no, g_name from workdialog w join guest g on w.w_g_no=g.g_no group by w_g_no order by count(w_priceTotal) desc
select sum(w_priceTotal) as w_priceTotal, w_g_no, g_name from workdialog w join guest g on w.w_g_no=g.g_no group by w_g_no order by sum(w_priceTotal) desc
select sum(w_priceTotal) as w_priceTotal, d_name from workdialog w left join choice c on w.w_g_no = c.c_w_no left join designer d on w.w_d_no = d.d_no group by d_name

select sum(w_priceTotal) as w_priceTotal, d_name, w_reservTime from workdialog w left join choice c on w.w_g_no = c.c_w_no left join designer d on w.w_d_no = d.d_no where w_reservTime between #{start} and #{end} group by d_name

select * from workdialog w join guest g on w.w_g_no=g.g_no join choice c on w.w_no=c.c_w_no join product p on p.p_name=c.c_p_name join designer d on d.d_no=w.w_d_no where g.g_name=#{gName} and g.g_tel=#{gTel}
